New-York Historical Society
Iselin Family papers
Iselin (Family)
MS 3076
3 items (in 1 half-document box)
1920, 1928, 1979 Two inventories appraising the household property of banker Lewis Iselin (1879–1928) at 16 West 52nd Street, Manhattan, and the estate of his widow, Marie (de Neufville) Iselin (1883–1979). With a resolution by the Union Club of the City of New York on Lewis Iselin's death. To request this collection for research, and for fuller details about it, please read its catalog record, or write to manuscripts@nyhistory.org.
